items.name: var anchorPoint: CGPoint
items.desc: Defines the point in the tile map that corresponds to its position.

items.name: var tileSize: CGSize
items.desc: The size of each tile in points.

items.name: var tileSet: SKTileSet
items.desc: The tile set being used by this tile map. The tile map object can only display tiles that exist in this set.

items.name: var numberOfColumns: Int
items.desc: The number of columns in the tile map

items.name: var numberOfRows: Int
items.desc: The number of rows in the tile map.

items.name: func centerOfTile(atColumn: Int, row: Int) -> CGPoint
func tileDefinition(atColumn: Int, row: Int) -> SKTileDefinition?
func tileGroup(atColumn: Int, row: Int) -> SKTileGroup?
func tileRowIndex(fromPosition: CGPoint) -> Int
items.desc: Returns the tile map node object’s tile row index for the specified position in points.

items.name: var mapSize: CGSize
items.desc: The overall size of the tile map.

items.name: var color: UIColor
items.desc: The base color for the tile map. The influence of the color over the tile map node’s textures is controlled by colorBlendFactor.

items.name: var colorBlendFactor: CGFloat
items.desc: Controls the blending between the texture and the tile map object’s color. Values are clamped between zero and one where zero has no color blending and one has the maximum color blending.

items.name: var lightingBitMask: UInt32
items.desc: A mask that defines how the tile map is lit by light nodes in the scene.

items.name: var blendMode: SKBlendMode
items.desc: Defines the blend mode to use when compositing the tile map over other nodes.

items.name: var shader: SKShader?
items.desc: Defines a shader which is applied to each tile of the tile map.

items.name: var attributeValues: [String : SKAttributeValue]
items.desc: The values of each attribute associated with the node's attached shader.

items.name: func setValue(SKAttributeValue, forAttribute: String)
items.desc: Sets an attribute value for an attached shader.

items.name: func value(forAttributeNamed: String) -> SKAttributeValue?
items.desc: The value of a shader attribute.
